item.description:
We've been meeting for about 9 years now (started before joining "Meetups") on Thursday evenings as an informal, "drop-in," donations welcome, group of people interested in Eckhart Tolle's writings and teachings. Usually around 10 people, the group size fluctuates between 5 and 18 each week.  Once people (like you!) find us on Meetups they don't usually register through this website each week - so you may not see a lot of activity on these pages even though the group is very active.

Good company, good snacks, good vibes, good meditation, good life! Visit www.sacredspaces.ws for more info and other events happening weekly and monthly here at Sacred Spaces. Related topics include:  meditation, retreat, inner peace, present moment, living in the now, spirituality, consciousness, awareness, spiritual community, friends, The Power of Now, A New Earth, and so on.  You get the picture!  I do look forward to meeting you here.  Peace,  Judy
item.name: Eckhart Tolle Evenings - Meditation, Spirituality
